snippet: The Washington Post's man in Tehran, Jason Rezaian, has discovered the perfect gift for pious Iranians who like to smoke in their cars: an air freshener in the image of Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.
abstract: The Washington Post's man in Tehran, Jason Rezaian, has discovered the perfect gift for pious Iranians who like to smoke in their cars: an air freshener in the image of Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.
